title: Dear Riot;   Please I beg...  give Fiora her Blade Waltz and Double Lunge back.
body:
I beg you daily...

Please I beg...  give Fiora her Blade Waltz and Double Lunge back.

replies.body:
Downvoted for not having a "Fiora is fine right now" option.
(Jk, I don't downvote.)

But she's so much better at killing one person now.

So she can be... The Grand Duelist she's meant to be.

Her teamfight suffers in comparison but something's gotta give.
